channel.title: CVE Feed for SixLabors -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SixLabors -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-27929|2024-03-06T21:57:58.269Z -- sixlabors -- imagesharp
item.description: ImageSharp is a managed, cross-platform, 2D graphics library. A heap-use-after-free flaw was found in ImageSharp's InitializeImage() function of PngDecoderCore.cs file. This vulnerability is triggered when an attacker passes a specially crafted PNG image file to ImageSharp for conversion, potentially leading to information disclosure. This issue has been patched in versions 3.1.3 and 2.1.7.
